title: Sweet Potato Day!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Ah, take a look at this, Maki-chan. A new drink came out.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Huh? Oh, I see. A sweet potato drink...... Sweet potato? They put sweet potatoes in a drink?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>So that it’ll have a strong taste of sweet potato......? That’s interesting~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Are you gonna go buy it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Do you wanna try it too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m okay. I don’t really get why they would do that......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Maki-chan, are you the type of person who hesitates to try new things?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Not really, but...... I just can’t imagine what a sweet potato drink would taste like.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Don’t worry about it! I’ll go buy it for us to share! Since we’re trying it together, it’ll be fun regardless of how it tastes!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait, hold on. Ayumu!? Wait up, Ayumu!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
